I am a statistics-economics student at the University of Haifa, interested in data and teaching. I serve as an assistant lecturer in Econometrics and Microeconomics courses.\
My hobbies include sports, chess and playing guitar. I compete in powerlifting competitions and also prepare athletes for powerlifting competitions.
